elements.title: I'm a developer
elements.text: I love the web and what's going on with it. Learn, create and share are my passions.

elements.title: I love coding
elements.text: I code in JavaScript and C#. I have experiences in @@web, @@mobile and @@software development.

elements.title: I work with all the good stuff
elements.text: Including AngularJS, Jasmine, Punch, HTML5, CSS3, Less, Handlebars, Bootstrap and a lot more.

elements.title: Are you hiring in San Francisco?
elements.text: Contact me, I'm currently looking for a job in this area.

elements.title: tomsdev.github.com
elements.text: @@web:Website of Thomas Laurent in HTML5/CSS3 using Punch, Handlebars, Bootstrap-Responsive and Less.

elements.title: Brackets TypeScript CodeIntel
elements.text: Extension for the @@web based @@software Brackets. It adds TypeScript support (Auto-completion, Quick Edit and more soon).

elements.title: Vocabulary
elements.text: A @@mobile @@web application to help language learners learn new words and their meanings. Built with AngularJS and jQuery mobile. Unit tested with Jasmine.

elements.title: Topological Sort
elements.text: Interesting @@web @@web:website application of topological sort. Good example of using AngularJS to build the UI, the service and test all the code with Jasmine.

elements.title: Web Developer at EADS Astrium
elements.text: Prototyped a @@web version of existing geo-imagery software using AngularJS, jQuery and Dynatree. It communicated with a Unity component and worked well with 10,000 objects.

elements.title: Birthday Social Calendar
elements.text: You'll never forget a birthday again! This application allows you to see upcoming birthdays of your friends and have reminders directly on Windows 8.

elements.title: Emoscale
elements.text: A software for EEG headsets, used in neuromarketing studies. It reads and logs your mood, mind and engagement to measure the impact of video pitches and new products.

elements.title: Software Developer at EADS Astrium
elements.text: Developed a timeline component with many functions for 3D geo-imagery software using WPF. It worked well with 10,000 time-tagged objects and kept synchronized with the other components.

elements.title: YouFood
elements.text: A web application for restaurants with realtime features via websockets. Clients can order a meal from their phone, waiters will see it in realtime on their tablets and cookers can take orders and mark them ready to served! Using ASP.Net MVC, Entity Framework and SignalR.

elements.title: Trainer at SUPINFO International University
elements.text: Taught approximately 500 hours of Silverlight, ASP.Net, WP7, EF, TFS and Azure to university classes.

elements.title: Intern at Exakis
elements.text: Prototyped and developed a timesheet management web application using ASP.Net.

elements.title: Ahead
elements.text: An easy to use project management service that lets you get tasks done according to priorities, time your work for any project, visualize your workload, remember your expenses... and a lot more!

elements.title: Intern at KLS Logistic Systems
elements.text: Developed a pharmacy stock manager web application and an intranet tool for planning using Silverlight. It communicated with the company Oracle database using ADO.NET and a web service.
